page.title: 06Day in the life of a farmer
page.content: The farmer rises every morning at about 6.30.a.m.,his first job is to feed the cattle.He has 170 Hereford cross Fresians.He carries out some general farm chores and then goes in to the farmhouse to have breakfast. After breakfast he mucks out the cowsheds and feeds his horses.He then checks on the stables and gives his animals fresh bedding. After lunch he works on his fields which consist of 15 acres of barley ,seven acres of oats and one acre of potatoes.the frmer lets two of his fields to tourists for camping and he goes to check on these and see if there are any problems.
